data.Name: Melissa Alford
data.staff_bio: Melissa Alford is a member of the research team at the Institute for Community Inclusion. She joined ICI in 2014 with a background in mental health research and advocacy. She currently works on researching different demandside strategies to help both businesses and people with disabilities seeking employment.
data.staff_ed:
M.H.S., Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health
B.A., Haverford College
